name: Color Code Converter
summary: Determine and convert the color code
constraints: Each line of input contains one color code, which can be either HSL or HSV containing an integer between 0 and 359 and two integers between 0 and 100, CMYK containing four floating point numbers between 0 and 1, or Hex containing one integer between 0 and ffffff. The number of input lines is unconstrained.
